alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 09 at 1:03PM PST until December 12 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following areas, Riverside County Mountains, San Bernardino County Mountains and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Flooding of poor drainage areas and near recent wildfire burn scars will be possible. Hourly rain rates of one-half inch or more will be possible with this storm.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
